testcase.name: Verify_scenario2
testcase.system-out: Open Base URL click on Mobile Menu Get cost of sony Xperia mobile from the list of all mobiles Click on mobile Xperia mobile Get cost of sony Xperia mobile from detail page Compare the 2 cost values Equal values

testsuite.system-out: Open Base URL Compare Titles click on Mobile Menu Compare Titles select type of Sort by Name Taking Screenshot check if the items are sorted by name or not Open Base URL click on Mobile Menu Get cost of sony Xperia mobile from the list of all mobiles Click on mobile Xperia mobile Get cost of sony Xperia mobile from detail page Compare the 2 cost values Equal values Open Base URL click on Mobile Menu Click Add to Cart for sony Xperia mobile Edit quantity for the item to be 1000 click update button Check error message error message shown with correct message Empty Cart check empty cart message message shown with correct message Open Base URL click on Mobile Menu Add to compare(Iphone) message shown with correct message Add to compare(Sony xperia) message shown with correct message Click on compare button switch to popup window title shown with correctly Open Base URL Click on my account link switching to new window Click Create an Account link fill New User information Click Register Verify Registration is done. Expected account registration done. Go to TV menu Add product in your wish list - use product - LG LCD Click SHARE WISHLIST In next page enter Email and a message and click SHARE WISHLIST Check wishlist is shared. Expected wishlist shared successfully.
